      • getGsonConverter

        protected abstract retrofit.converter.GsonConverter getGsonConverter()
        Returns a GsonConverter, which can be used by retrofit. Create a GSON with a builder, then use GsonConverter(GSON).
        Returns:
        An object, which converts JSON to the correct Java objects.

      • get

        public abstract void get(java.lang.String id,
       AbstractAPIClient.Params params,
       EntityHandler<T> handler)
        Used for fetching single objects from the API
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier of the object.
        params - Parameters of the query. Use null if none.
        handler - Callback on success or failure.

      • addParametersAlways

        private AbstractAPIClient.Params addParametersAlways(AbstractAPIClient.Params params)

        Returns:
        The Params object with the needed parameters.
